document_data.caption: A map showing Dulgen's Pipe Shop on Simple's Street.
document_data.name: Dulgen's Pipe Shop
document_data.mainbody: '''Dulgen's Pipe Shop''' was a shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
document_data.Description: The rear of the shop faced a small unnamed alley.
document_data.Location: Dulgen's Pipe Shop was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the north side of [[Simple's Street]] in between [[Virgin's Square]] to the west and the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]] to the east.
